name: Captain Radio
description:
This app handles all the possible actions and information that could help the Radio Operator pin-point the opposing team's location on the map.

Tracks enemy actions:
- Movement
- Mines (dropping and detonating)
- Torpedos
- Silence
- Surfacing

Incorporates information gathered from your Captain's actions:
- Drones
- Sonar
- Weapon explosions (Torpedos and Mines)

Notice: THIS DOES NOT REPLACE ANY PART OF THE BOARD GAME!
This app is meant to be a companion to the board game "Captain Sonar" to be used while playing. This app is meant for no other purpose or use.

This app uses the internet for anonymous tracking of feature usage.
